title: Creative RGB Lighting Techniques for Photography
summary: Lindsay Adler introduces a tutorial on using RGB continuous lights to achieve diverse photographic styles. She demonstrates how to create dramatic, saturated images as well as soft, pastel looks using various creative tools like filters, projectors, and smoke machines.

steps.action: Introduction to using RGB continuous lights to create various looks.
Create dramatic, low-key images using super saturated colors.
Create softer images with a pastel look.
Apply creative filters to project patterns and shapes.
Utilize a digital projector for unique lighting effects.
Use a handheld smoke machine to add atmosphere and texture.

key_takeaways: RGB lights are versatile for creating both high-contrast, saturated looks and soft, pastel aesthetics.
Creative in-camera techniques can be achieved using additional tools like filters and projectors.
Atmospheric effects like smoke can enhance the impact of RGB lighting.
